dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I decided to ignore the uncomfortable feeling from the doorway. It was something I regretted though as I could feel it getting more and more intense by the second.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I turned around, but much to my surprise there was nobody there.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I turned back and jumped as Lucci was right next to me!
